mapper.insert: insert into sportzplatform.tournament_categories (tournament_refid, tournament_category, parent_category_id, tournament_format, reg_fee, minimum_players, maximum_players, min_reg_count,max_reg_count,age_restriction, sex_restriction, average_age,tournament_config) values (#{tournamentRefid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tournamentCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tournamentFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regFee,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{minimumPlayers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maximumPlayers,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{minRegCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{maxRegCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ageRestriction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sexRestriction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{averageAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tournamentConfig,jdbcType=OTHER,typeHandler=com.skiya.sportzplatform.common.JsonTypeHandler} )
mapper.update: update sportzplatform.tournament_categories set tournament_refid = #{tournamentRefid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tournament_category = #{tournamentCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_category_id = #{parentCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tournament_format = #{tournamentFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reg_fee = #{regFee,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, minimum_players = #{minimumPlayers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, maximum_players = #{maximumPlayers,jdbcType=INTEGER}, min_reg_count = #{minRegCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, max_reg_count = #{maxRegCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, age_restriction = #{ageRestriction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex_restriction = #{sexRestriction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, average_age = #{averageAge,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tournament_config = #{tournamentConfig,jdbcType=OTHER,typeHandler=com.skiya.sportzplatform.common.JsonTypeHandler} where tournament_category_id = #{tournamentCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select tournament_category_id, tournament_refid, tournament_category, parent_category_id, tournament_format, reg_fee, minimum_players, maximum_players, min_reg_count,max_reg_count,age_restriction, sex_restriction, average_age,tournament_config from sportzplatform.tournament_categories where tournament_category_id = #{tournamentCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select tournament_category_id, tournament_refid, tournament_category, parent_category_id, tournament_format, reg_fee, minimum_players, maximum_players, min_reg_count,max_reg_count, age_restriction, sex_restriction, average_age,tournament_config from sportzplatform.tournament_categories
